title: Company Management Database:
description: Developed a company database website using SQL, PHP, HTML, and CSS to track employee records, product inventories, orders, delivery logistics, customer data, department structures, and ex-employee data

title: Movie Recommendation Website:
description: Developed a movie recommendation website using react that suggested a list of movies for users to watch based on their preferences & interests.

title: Events & Venue Management Website:
description: Events & Venue Management Website, similar to EventBrite. Includes interactive maps, event scheduling, and a discussion board.

title: Rent Tracking Program:
description: Developed a tenant & rent tracking software for a real estate company, providing a tool to manage and organise tenant information, lease durations, and revenue records

title: Messaging Program:
description: Created a Python-based program to implement the messaging protocol, allowing users to send and receive messages seamlessly.

title: Wedding Reservation Management:
description: Developed a Python program to coordinate wedding venue and band bookings, using API data to compare and book the earliest available time slots.

title: This Portfolio Website:
description: I created this portfoilio website to give you a quick summary of me and my work.
